meanings.definition: A path for pedestrians alongside a road.
meanings.sent1: The footway was lined with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: I always walk on the footway to stay safe from traffic.
meanings.sent3: The footway seemed to be playing hide and seek with the road.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed along the footway like a melody.
meanings.sent5: The footway snaked through the neighborhood like a friendly guide.

meanings.sent1: The footway was busy with people walking to work.
meanings.sent2: She tripped on a crack in the footway and almost fell.
meanings.sent3: The footway looked like a long, gray ribbon winding through the city.
meanings.sent4: The footway whispered secrets of the town to those who walked on it.
meanings.sent5: The footway gleamed under the streetlights, inviting late-night strolls.
